Sentencas: Quantitative understanding of the evolving thermal-mechanical properties of a multi-phase material relies on the availability of statistically representative microstructure descriptions.
Titulo: Mechanism-based representative volume elements (RVEs) for predicting property degradations in multiphase materials

Sentencas: Questions then arise as to whether a two-dimensional (2D) or a three-dimensional (3D) representative volume element (RVE) should be considered as the statistically representative microstructure.
Titulo: Mechanism-based representative volume elements (RVEs) for predicting property degradations in multiphase materials

Sentencas: Although 3D models are more physically representative than 2D models in general, they are usually computationally expensive and difficult to be retrieved and/or reconstructed.
Titulo: Mechanism-based representative volume elements (RVEs) for predicting property degradations in multiphase materials

Sentencas: In this paper, we evaluate the accuracy of a 2D RVE in predicting the property degradations induced by different degradation mechanisms with the multiphase solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) anode material as an example.
Titulo: Mechanism-based representative volume elements (RVEs) for predicting property degradations in multiphase materials

Sentencas: Both 2D and 3D microstructure RVEs of the anodes are adopted to quantify the effects of two different degradation mechanisms: humidity-induced electrochemical degradation and phosphorus poisoning induced structural degradation.
Titulo: Mechanism-based representative volume elements (RVEs) for predicting property degradations in multiphase materials

Sentencas: The predictions of the 2D model are then compared with the available experimental measurements and the results from the 3D model.
Titulo: Mechanism-based representative volume elements (RVEs) for predicting property degradations in multiphase materials

Sentencas: It is found that the 2D model, limited by its inability to reproduce the realistic electrical percolation, is unable to accurately predict the degradation of thermo-electrical properties.
Titulo: Mechanism-based representative volume elements (RVEs) for predicting property degradations in multiphase materials

Sentencas: On the other hand, for the phosphorus poisoning induced structural degradation, both the 2D and 3D microstructures yield similar results, indicating that the 2D model is capable of providing computationally efficient yet accurate results for studying the structural degradation within the anodes.
Titulo: Mechanism-based representative volume elements (RVEs) for predicting property degradations in multiphase materials
Mechanism-based representative volume elements (RVEs) for predicting property degradations in multiphase materials
Mechanism-based representative volume elements (RVEs) for predicting property degradations in multiphase materials
